p: Vero E6 ( Cercopithecus aethiops; kidney epithelial; ATCC CRL-1586) and A549 cells expressing the ACE2 protein (A549_ACE2+) ( 20) were maintained in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM; Thermo Fisher Scientific, Poland) supplemented with 3% heat-inactivated fetal bovine serum (FBS; Thermo Fisher Scientific, Poland) and streptomycin (100 μg/ml), penicillin (100 U/ml), and ciprofloxacin (5 μg/ml). A549_ACE2+ cell cultures were supplemented with G418 (5 mg/ml; BioShop, Canada). Cells were cultured at 37°C in an atmosphere containing 5% CO 2.
